Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory360.png'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'RImgBg1Shake'}
{3: 'An explosion rips through the side door of the transport, half-buried in mud at the edge of the dense forest.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiFogNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{3: 'White smoke rises from two smoke grenades as shadows dart through the haze.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiFogNew.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{3: 'Without warning, the belly-mounted turrets open fire, spraying bullets into the surrounding trees.'}
{1: 'PanelActor2Shake'}
{1: 'PanelActor1Shake'}
{1: 'PanelActor1Shake'}
{1: 'PanelActor2Shake'}
{1: '1', 3: 'The large-caliber rounds tear through the two Corrupted hiding behind the trees, sending them crashing to the ground.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Discord', 3: 'Report—targets eliminated by turret fire.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Valeria', 3: 'Yata, take point.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Valeria', 3: 'Shiva, maintain electronic warfare and environmental scanning. Stay beside me or take position behind.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Valeria', 3: 'Discord, take rear guard. Protect Shiva and watch our six.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{3: 'Valeria swiftly swings her weapon toward the dark thicket, firing two pulse rounds.'}
{3: 'The whistling rounds pierce into the thicket and vanish into silence as if devoured by the darkness.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Valeria', 3: 'They dodged it.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Valeria', 3: 'Everyone, night vision on.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Before the words can settle, three Corrupted spring out from the clearing just ahead of the Scarabs.'}
{3: 'The Corrupted fan out in a trident formation, pressing their attack.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: 'You bastards having a party here?!', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiZhuanchangBeginHei.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'RImgBg1Shake'}
{1: 'RImgBg1Shake'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiZhuanchangBeginHei.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Yata charges forward decisively, her mechanical arms making quick work of two Corrupted with effortless swings.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineSpreadNew.prefab', 2: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'The remaining Corrupted hesitates for a moment, then bypasses Yata to charge straight at Valeria.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: "Heads up, Valeria! They're coming for you!", 4: '1'}
{1: 'RImgBg1Shake'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Valeria fires twice, but the Corrupted sprints straight through the gunfire.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'As everyone moves to defend Valeria, a towering figure suddenly materializes behind Shiva.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{3: 'Before that moment arrives, a nimble figure dashes past both Valeria and Shiva in a blur.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineSpreadNew.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'RImgBg1Shake'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Two pairs of metallic arms intercept the incoming fists.'}
{1: 'RImgBg1Shake'}
{3: 'The towering mechanoid staggers back two steps as its attack is interrupted by the counterforce.'}
{3: 'With her mechanical arms extended, Yata cracks her neck in annoyance as she stares down her opponent.'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "I'm right here, dumbo!", 4: '1'}
{3: "Standing tall, Yata uses her external arms to forcefully twist the Corrupted's fists away from their intended direction."}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "When it comes to raw strength, I won't lose to you!", 4: '1'}
{3: "Inch by inch, the Corrupted's body is forced off the ground in the struggle."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiJiyouNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: "A deep breath. Feet planted firmly. Then—a straight punch pierces through the Corrupted's chest."}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiJiyouNew.prefab'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'Two fists against six—get it now, you big lug?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Valeria', 3: "Yata, stay alert! They're coordinating their attacks!", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: 'Valeria calls out the warning while maintaining suppressive fire in the opposite direction.'}
{3: 'But before Valeria can finish her sentence, she notices something off.'}
{2: 'Valeria', 3: 'Tactics...', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Tactical coordination?', 3: '60'}
{3: 'Tactical coordination?'}
{1: 'Can the Corrupted really understand tactics at all?', 3: '60'}
{3: 'Can the Corrupted really understand tactics at all?'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory432.jpg'}
{3: 'Though there was that incident at Praia Forest Park...'}
{3: 'But that was essentially just a hive mind issuing collective commands.'}
{3: 'These Corrupted are coordinating with one another far too perfectly.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory360.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Valeria', 3: 'There must be a puppeteer behind this.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Valeria', 3: "This isn't something mechanical minds can cook up.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: "Are you suggesting they're operating with a commandant-and-squad formation like us?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Valeria', 3: "But you're not my puppets.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Valeria', 3: 'The Corrupted attacking us are just mindless marionettes programmed for suicide attacks.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: 'Come to think of it, they breached our M.I.N.D. without any resistance...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'How did they manage to do that?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'While Yata is lost in thought, a mechanoid covered in explosives shambles toward them, its movements unsteady.'}
{2: 'Self-Destruction Mechanoid', 3: 'Land of eternity... paradise... escape from this mortal realm...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Self-Destruction Mechanoid', 3: 'I... am a firefly...', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineSpreadNew.prefab', 2: '1'}
{3: 'With these cryptic words, the Self-Destruction Mechanoid suddenly charges at Valeria in a frenzy.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'RImgBg1Shake'}
{1: '1', 3: 'With lightning-fast reflexes, Yata kicks the Self-Destruction Mechanoid skyward.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineSpreadNew.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryExplosionL.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryExplosionR.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: 'After a blinding flash, the airborne mechanoid becomes nothing more than a momentary burst of light.'}
{3: 'Its "remains" rain down like metallic petals, scattering across the ground with an otherworldly wail.'}
{3: "After a moment's pause, Valeria and Yata cautiously approach to investigate."}
{3: 'A fragment of bionic vocal cords on the ground continues to emit unintelligible static, stuttering and mumbling.'}
{2: 'Self-Destruction Mechanoid', 3: 'The promise... Yata... come back...'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{3: 'Before the mechanoid can finish speaking, Valeria raises her gun and delivers the final shot.'}
{3: 'At this moment, Shiva and Discord arrive on the scene.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: 'Did I hear that wrong, or was it just... calling my name?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Valeria', 3: 'Unless we all heard wrong.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Shiva', 3: "What's really going on with these Corrupted?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Shiva', 3: 'Three units appeared as a group. Two executed feint attacks while the third charged straight for V.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Shiva', 3: "Are they assuming that the Task Force's commandant lacks combat capabilities?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Valeria', 3: 'Take out the command first, then dismantle the rest of the squad one by one.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Valeria', 3: 'Maybe this is how we lost contact with the last Task Force.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Valeria', 3: 'Tell me exactly what happened here.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Valeria', 3: 'Why... did that Corrupted know your name?', 4: '1'}
{3: "Valeria's voice remains unnaturally calm."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: 'I have no idea how to answer that question, V.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'This is my first time back here in years.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'Back then, the Punishing wiped out almost all of humanity. Even my best friend.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'Ghosts... are probably the only things left here.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "If that's what you're trying to ask!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'She shifts her gaze away from Yata and prepares to step forward.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'But in that instant, almost simultaneously, Yata collapses face-first onto the ground.'}
{3: "Valeria kneels down and sees that Yata's eyes have gone lifeless."}
{2: 'Valeria', 3: '...A M.I.N.D. quake!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Valeria', 3: 'Stay calm and focus on the Mind Beacon.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Just as Valeria is about to connect with Yata, Discord, too, collapses to the ground nearby.'}
{2: 'Valeria', 3: "They're falling one after another?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Valeria', 3: "The commandant's consciousness connection with their squad weakens when they lose focus.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Valeria', 3: 'This was the moment they were waiting for.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Valeria turns to Shiva, the only one still barely conscious.'}
{2: 'Valeria', 3: 'Shiva, report.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Shiva', 3: 'My head... it hurts... damn it... Valeria!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Shiva', 3: "There's a force in my M.I.N.D... It's trying to tear us away from your beacon...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Gritting her teeth, Valeria struggles with all her might to stabilize the connection.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryZhengyanNew01.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: 'Lying on the ground, Yata seems to be regaining consciousness.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1063.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '0.5', 5: '2'}
{3: "However, what reflects in Yata's eyes is an otherworldly scene, one that looks like anything but a battlefield..."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1063.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryMovieFilm.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: 'Endless rays of bright sunlight fill a spacious classroom where boys and girls in uniforms gather.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Their faces beam with bright smiles as they join hands, singing a heartwarming melody together.', 4: '1', 5: '2'}
{1: '1', 3: 'They sing on tirelessly, free from worry and care.', 4: '1', 5: '2'}
{3: '—How many years have flown by since those days of school life...'}
{3: "—When we look back, we're surprised by how fast time went by..."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: 'Is this... a graduation ceremony?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'A young girl, holding a bouquet of hydrangeas, makes her way through the crowd toward Yata.'}
{3: 'A pleasant floral fragrance emanates from her—an innocent scent that puts all guards down.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryMovieFilm.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory360.png'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryZhengyanNew01.prefab'}
{2: 'Valeria', 3: 'Hallucinations, huh...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Valeria', 3: 'No time to waste. We need to do a deep dive now.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Valeria takes a deep breath and closes her eyes.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'As a commandant, she understands the implications of such actions in battle.', 4: '2'}
{3: "Dropping one's defense, even briefly, means becoming nothing more than a sitting duck on the battlefield.", 4: '2'}
{3: "Casting all caution aside, Valeria dives deep into Yata's M.I.N.D.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Suddenly, sounds emerge from the dense forest, followed by intermittent footsteps that break the silence...'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Shiva', 3: "Valeria, something's coming...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Shiva lets out a heavy sigh as she watches an unresponsive Valeria.'}
{3: "As the footsteps draw closer, she staggers forward to grab Valeria's sidearm."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryGanRanNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Construct?', 3: 'Join us... Join the spiritual Eden... Become a citizen of the eternal realm.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Construct?', 3: 'Whatever your faith may be, this is the ultimate paradise, Canaan, the Pure Land...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The controlled Construct soldier mutters incomprehensible words as it slowly raises its weapon at Shiva.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryGanRanNew.prefab'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Shiva', 3: '...Stay away from us!', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{3: 'A pulse bursts from the muzzle, knocking down the already unstable Construct.'}
{2: 'Shiva', 3: 'Why did you betray Babylonia?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Construct?', 3: 'We did not... have a choice.'}
{2: 'Construct?', 3: "She's... invading our minds..."}
{2: 'Construct?', 3: "Her dream of Eden is corrupting everyone's will..."}
{1: '1', 3: 'The fallen Construct continues to mutter bewildering phrases, while Shiva, beyond exhausted, collapses to her knees.'}
{2: 'Shiva', 3: "So this is what it's like getting controlled...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Corrupted', 3: 'SCREEEEE—', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{3: 'Shiva struggles to pull the trigger, but cannot stop the massive Corrupted from drawing near.'}
{2: 'Shiva', 3: 'Valeria... are we not done yet?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Shiva', 3: 'I have a bad feeling about—', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineFocusNew.prefab', 2: '1'}
{3: "An elongated shadow blocks out the light from Shiva's view as something hoists her onto its shoulder and frantically runs away. She desperately tries to scream, but no sound comes out."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: 'Stop right there!', 4: '1'}
{3: "A bolt of electricity pierces through the Corrupted's body, but another Construct quickly snatches Shiva away."}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineFocusNew.prefab'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: 'Tsk... I was too late.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Despite launching an attack the moment her consciousness returned, Yata, due to insufficient charge, fails to stop the Construct that took Shiva.'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'The Corrupted working together with Construct soldiers? What interesting times we live in.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'What kind of brainwashing did they go through to become one big family?!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Valeria', 3: "I'm more curious about who it is that's working the strings here.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Having just stabilized Discord, Valeria forces herself to stand up.'}
{2: 'Valeria', 3: "We don't have time for that now. Isn't Shiva's tracking device connected to our terminals?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Discord', 3: "We can still track her now since the connection's still active, but I can't guarantee it'll work if they get too far.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Discord', 3: 'Someone needs to stay close to her to act as a relay point for the connection to stay alive because of signal interference.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Valeria', 3: 'If we align the direction in which the interference is the most powerful...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Valeria', 3: "With where the corrupted M.I.N.D.'s infiltration is intensifying...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Valeria', 3: 'Bearing 451 is where the two overlap. Initiating image analysis.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Discord', 3: 'Enhancing night vision mode... Looks like a stone monument among some abandoned buildings.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Discord', 3: "There's a line of text embedded in the stone monument. It's hard to make it out, but it looks like something about a school...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: 'Misono Academy High School.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "That's not a monument. It's our high school gate.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "Let me handle this. I know the school's layout well.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'Try to brute force your way through them while I draw their fire.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Valeria briefly closes her eyes.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: "We can't wait any longer... Scarab can't afford to lose another member.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "I'll be back in one piece, and I'll bring Shiva back with me...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Valeria', 3: "Don't force your way through. Fall back if things ever go south.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Valeria', 3: 'Keep your terminal on and check in every ten minutes.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Valeria is unusually fussy with her instructions.'}
{2: 'Valeria', 3: "Also, short-range communications on the ground are working just fine, but we aren't getting any response to any messages sent to Babylonia.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Valeria', 3: 'Take the comm relay with you.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Valeria hands a black device to Yata.'}
{2: 'Valeria', 3: 'We can reach out to Babylonia once we restore long-range communication. The rooftop would make an excellent installation site.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineFocusNew.prefab', 2: '1'}
{3: 'Yata knocks down two approaching Corrupted with her mechanical arm and dashes into the dense forest.'}
{2: 'Valeria', 3: 'Discord, prepare to strike—', 4: '1'}
